text: 18.8: Mt 5.30 naŋga, Mk 9.43Nandɨ kuma vaha mana tanda vaha pɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨramɨti ñamba vana andɨtaŋgata pɨtɨta kavarɨna umɨ. Kamata avinda kuma timu naŋga tanda tamu naŋgandaya kɨta sɨhaŋgɨyɨmana. Nandɨ kuma arɨkita naŋga tanda arɨkita kɨtunda naŋ Got ahu maŋgɨmuhɨmu tuta sɨhaŋgɨndi hañɨ kavarɨti unamandɨhi.
